title: my league wont update 6.22 and/ or the client update and now i cant play at all!:( help please!!
body: during updating to 6.22 after the patch is done it then proceeds to update the league client and then itll hit about 5%-6% and then just say unspecified error occured, please help as i havent played in a week now because of this:((

replies.body:
Hmm.. Issues within the first 32% are typically related to missing admin privileges that League relies on to operate as expected. I'd recommend checking out the steps inside our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure everything's configured up to spec.

Let me know if this resolved your issue. ^.^
